code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./css/CodingWork.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CodingWork=()=>{const[projects,setProjects]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/projects').then(response=>setProjects(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching projects:',error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Coding Work"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"project-list",children:projects.map(project=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description}),project.githubLink&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.githubLink,children:"GitHub Repo"})}),project.backgroundImage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.backgroundImage,alt:"Background"})]},project._id))})]});};export default CodingWork;
